title: Three things we love: A dark lip in the fall, a fantastic attitude, and our Admissions Director Mary...

attachments.displayName:
Three things we love: A dark lip in the fall, a fantastic attitude, and our Admissions Director Mary. We are swooning over this lovely ‘ode-to-Mary’ post by new #Fashion Merchandising student Tara Osipoff!
“Today was my "official" first day of school!! I want to give a special thank you to one woman in particular who helped me through my journey. Mary your kindness will never be forgotten. You underestimate how important your role is in the success of those around you. You are a beacon of light and your beautiful attitude is infectious. You're patience and determination is so admirable and inspiring. Thank you so much for helping me walk through those doors! I look forward to our year together.”

object.content:
Three things we love: A dark lip in the fall, a fantastic attitude, and our Admissions Director Mary. We are swooning over this lovely ‘ode-to-Mary’ post by new #Fashion Merchandising student Tara Osipoff!
“Today was my "official" first day of school!! I want to give a special thank you to one woman in particular who helped me through my journey. Mary your kindness will never be forgotten. You underestimate how important your role is in the success of those around you. You are a beacon of light and your beautiful attitude is infectious. You're patience and determination is so admirable and inspiring. Thank you so much for helping me walk through those doors! I look forward to our year together.”
